title: Address
description: Json schema for an Address response class. See curl examples: get_route_directions, get_route_path_points

timeframe_violation_state.title: Timeframe violation state
timeframe_violation_state.description: State of the timeframe violation. In a response only

timeframe_violation_time.title: Timeframe violation time
timeframe_violation_time.description: Moment of the timeframe violation. In a response only

timeframe_violation_rate.title: Timeframe violation rate
timeframe_violation_rate.description: Rate of the timeframe violation. In a response only

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: 0 is the highest priority; n has higher priority than n + 1

original_route_id.title: Original Route ID
original_route_id.description: The original customer-specific route id assigned at route creation time.

sequence_no.title: Sequence No
sequence_no.description: The sequence number for the address

geocoded.title: Geocoded
geocoded.description: True means the 'address' field was successfully geocoded

preferred_geocoding.title: Preferred Geocoding
preferred_geocoding.description: Index of 'geocodings' array that the user has chosen

failed_geocoding.title: Failed Geocoding
failed_geocoding.description: True means there was a geocoding attempt which failed. False means success or no geocoding

contact_id.title: Contact ID
contact_id.description: Address book contact id (0 means not connected to the address book)

address_stop_type.title: Address stop type
address_stop_type.description: The type of stop that this is (PICKUP, DELIVERY, BREAK, MEETUP)

timestamp_last_departed.title: Timestamp Last Departed
timestamp_last_departed.description: Timestamp when the driver marks the stop as 'Departed'

customer_po.title: Customer PO
customer_po.description: The customer purchase order for the address

invoice_no.title: Invoice No
invoice_no.description: The invoice number for the address

reference_no.title: Reference NO
reference_no.description: The reference number for the address

order_no.title: Order NO
order_no.description: The order number for the address

cost.title: Cost
cost.description: The cost of the order for the address

revenue.title: Revenue
revenue.description: The total revenue for the address

cube.title: Cube
cube.description: The cubic volume of the cargo being delivered or picked up at the address

first_name.title: First name
first_name.description: The first name of the receiving address

last_name.title: Last name
last_name.description: The last name of the receiving address

email.title: Email
email.description: A valid e-mail address assigned to this stop

destination_note_count.title: Destination Note Count
destination_note_count.description: How many notes have been added to this destination

drive_time_to_next_destination.title: Drive Time to next Destination
drive_time_to_next_destination.description: Time to next destination in seconds.

abnormal_traffic_time_to_next_destinatio.description: Abnormal traffic time to next destination
abnormal_traffic_time_to_next_destinatio.title: Abnormal traffic time to next destination

uncongested_time_to_next_destination.title: Uncongested Time To Next Destination
uncongested_time_to_next_destination.description: Supposing that there was no traffic at all, this gives how many seconds it takes to get to the next stop.

traffic_time_to_next_destination.title: Traffic Time To Next Destination
traffic_time_to_next_destination.description: Traffic time to a next destination.

distance_to_next_destination.title: Distance to next destination
distance_to_next_destination.description: Distance to next destination in route unit (the default unit is in miles)

generated_time_window_start.title: Generated Time Window Start
generated_time_window_start.description: Generated Time Window Start in seconds

generated_time_window_end.title: Generated Time Window End
generated_time_window_end.description: Generated Time Window End in seconds

time_window_start.title: Time Window Start
time_window_start.description: Time Window Start in seconds, relative to the route start date (midnight), UTC time zone. It is relative to start datebecause start time changes would shift time windows

time_window_end.title: Time Window End
time_window_end.description: Time Window End in seconds, relative to the route start date (midnight), UTC time zone. It is relative to start datebecause start time changes would shift time windows

geofence_detected_visited_timestamp.title: Geofence detected visited timestamp
geofence_detected_visited_timestamp.description: Timestamp of a geofence detected visited

geofence_detected_departed_timestamp.title: Geofence detected departed timestamp
geofence_detected_departed_timestamp.description: Timestamp of a geofence detected departed

geofence_detected_service_time.title: Geofence detected service time
geofence_detected_service_time.description: The service time of a detected geofence

geofence_detected_visited_lat.title: Geofence detected visited lat
geofence_detected_visited_lat.description: Latitude of a visited detected geofence

geofence_detected_visited_lng.title: Geofence detected visited lng
geofence_detected_visited_lng.description: Longitude of a visited detected geofence

geofence_detected_departed_lat.title: Geofence detected departed lat
geofence_detected_departed_lat.description: Latitude of a departed detected geofence

geofence_detected_departed_lng.title: Geofence detected departed lng
geofence_detected_departed_lng.description: Longitude of a departed detected geofence

tracking_number.title: Tracking Number
tracking_number.description: Systemwide unique code, which permits end-users (recipients) to track the status of their order

custom_fields.description: Any unrecognized fields from the original CSV upload will be found here
custom_fields.title: Custom Fields

custom_fields_str_json.title: Custom fields JSON string
custom_fields_str_json.description: JSON string representation of the custom fields

custom_fields_config_str_json.title: Custom fields config JSON string
custom_fields_config_str_json.description: JSON string representation of the custom fields configuration

account_no.title: Account NO
account_no.description: The account number for the address

running_service_time.title: Running Service Time
running_service_time.description: How much time is to be spent on service from the start in seconds

running_travel_time.title: Running Travel Time
running_travel_time.description: How much time is spent driving from the start in seconds

running_distance.title: Running Distance
running_distance.description: Distance traversed before reaching this address

actual_arrival_time_ts.title: Actual Arrival Time ts
actual_arrival_time_ts.description: Time when the address was marked as visited UTC unixtime. This is actually equal to timestamp_last_visited most of the time.

actual_departure_time_ts.title: Actual Departure Time ts
actual_departure_time_ts.description: Time when the address was mared as departed UTC. This is actually equal to timestamp_last_departed most of the time.

estimated_arrival_time_ts.title: Estimated Arrival Time ts
estimated_arrival_time_ts.description: Estimated arrival time based on the current route progress, i.e. based on the last known actual_arrival_time

estimated_departure_time_ts.title: Estimated Departure Time ts
estimated_departure_time_ts.description: Estimated departure time based on the current route progress

time_impact.title: Time Impact
time_impact.description: This is the difference between the originally projected arrival time and Actual Arrival Time

manifest.description: The manifest contains values derived from other values
manifest.title: Manifest
